_sText:
!UPDATE! I messed up again. fixed v3b is now up. The zoo part wss broken. If you downloaded v3, please update to v3b.Sorry for the inconvenience.

- Surf_XIV_v3 changelog-
-Various small bugfixes

-Removed parts-
Fourcorners: People don't get it 
Jungle: It sucked and too big: max_map_planes

-Added parts-
Zoo:
Ride the turtles, dodge the sharks, get eaten by the hippo, feed your team to Jaws.
Banocanyon: Combat map based on banocanyon

-Changed parts-

Spawn: 
-Fixed dying from blockers(I think - it never happens to me)
-Added messages saying what map is chosen
Halfpipe: 
-Scaled 0.75 
-Tweaked Speed
Leet: 
-Deleted most of it, just kept spawn and initial ramps for faster gameplay.
-Added conveyors
-Made telehopping easier
-Added door to open between spawns after 0.5 minutes
Hammer:
-Made second part significantly harder
-Fixed tele-hopping
-Added grinder as kill option
-Fixed elevator
Knifearena:
-Is now shotty arena
-M249 in the middle
-Added gate so everyone starts at the same time
Slide:
-Scaled 0.75
-Increased damage at bottom
Rebels:
-Floor at spawn now kills so spawnjumping takes a bit longer
Windows:
-New jail
-Tweaked surf to increase difficulty
-Added 30 seconds to timer
Scoutzknivez:
-Added crosshair for scout
-No fall damage

Description:
When you spawn, look up. You'll see 14 screens above you. Each screen represents a map, except for the random-screen, which picks one of the other screens. Each map is a standalone map and has no connection to the other maps. The idea is to play a different map each round, picked by one lucky person, the person to make it to the teleport first.
